name.ja: <ruby>共界神淵体<rt>メタトロニオス</rt></ruby>

text.en: Target 1 face-up non-Token monster your opponent controls; Special Summon 1 monster from your hand, Deck, or Extra Deck that has 2 or more of the same Type, Attribute, or ATK (but negate its effects), and if you do, negate the targeted monster's effects, then, if the Summoned monster and the targeted monster have the same name, you can banish both monsters, face-down. Your opponent cannot activate the targeted monster's effects in response to this card's activation. You can only activate 1 "Metaltronios" per turn.
